original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2381)@</color>  引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形龜甲盾，在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1512)@</color>秒內減少60%<color=#80cc00>物理傷害</color>。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2381)@</color> Bleeding air condense shield, forming a spherical tortoise shield around the generals, in the next <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1512)@</color> 50% <color=#80cc00>physical damage</color> in seconds.
